summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: No Brainer Gentle Facial Cleanser, 6 fl. oz, For Dry & Sensitive Skin, Leaves Skin Feeling Clean, Soft and Hydrated, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein & Amino Acids Restores Skin by Higher Education Skincare
Review Date: 2020/08/12
Store: Higher Education
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 2.3 x 2.3 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381030056'}
Review Text: I like the smell of this and how light it is. It does kinda feel like jelly and doesn’t lather up super great for me, but it gets the job done and makes my face feel good. Haven’t broken out or had irritated skin from it. The smell is light and reminds me of something I can’t put my finger on...maybe light citrus candy or something? It smells pretty good to me and I enjoy washing with this in the shower. Good size too!
Review Title: A pleasant, non-irritating face wash
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Study Buddy Clay Mask with Detoxifying Bentonite, 3 fl. oz., Exfoliates, Brightens and Clears Pores, Clay Draws Out Impurities and Improves Skin's Texture and Tone by Higher Education Skincare
Review Date: 2020/09/02
Store: Higher Education
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Item Form': 'Clay', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Scent': 'Exfoliating', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.6 x 3.6 x 1.3 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381035006'}
Review Text: I love a good face mask - this hits all the marks for me. It is thick and basically feels like wet pottery in your hands (hence the clay), smells nice (somewhat perfume-y) and most importantly, feels like something I’d get at a spa. When I first put it on, I was surprised by the warming sensation, since I didn’t realize it had that effect. I liked it! I’ve had masks like that before and they just add another dimension to the experience. I left it on for 10 minutes and washed it right off. Some clay masks I’ve used are hard to wash off - not this one. Face felt smooth and had no irritation afterward. I really like this brand.
Review Title: Warming sensation is so good
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Butt Naked Baby Organic Sunshine Lotion | Everyday Moisturizer | Lightweight, Non-Greasy | Normal-to-Dry Skin | Aloe, Shea Butter, Sunflower Oil, Calendula, White Tea, Green Tea, Rooibos Tea, Lemon Oil | 6.7 oz
Review Date: 2020/11/17
Store: Butt Naked Baby
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Butt Naked Baby', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Active Ingredients': 'Vitamin_e', 'Unit Count': '6.7 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 2.24 x 2.09 inches; 7.8 Ounces'}
Review Text: I really wanted to like this. The name, packaging and labeling is cute. “The 91%” organic label on the front was odd, yet reassuring that they are a transparent and honest brand (I mean, where else have you seen such a random percentage?) Yet, when I smelled it, I did not like it. At all. I can’t describe it really; it’s a faint, cheap perfumey sunflower smell. I didn’t like it for our toddler and couldn’t even tolerate it for me. I wouldn’t say I’m really that picky of a person, but I just didn’t jive with the smell. I even offered it to my husband because he likes organic lotions for the back of his arms where he has some KP but even he didn’t like it! I guess in a pinch we could use it, but it will not be preferred over other scents.
Review Title: The packaging is cute, the smell is not
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: NEW Challenger Men's Rinse Free Hand Wash - 1oz - Portable, 30% Alcohol Hand Wash both Cleans & Moisturizes. Hydrates Hands, Forearms, & Skin - Cleansing 30% Alc. Based Formula Washes and Nourishes
Review Date: 2020/11/23
Store: Challenger
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'Challenger', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '4 x 1 x 1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '851264008338'}
Review Text: Clean fresh scent and well moisturized after using. Not greasy at all, very happy with quality of this product. Sleek packaging and convenient size for car, home, or even keeping in your pockets. I highly recommend.
Review Title: Good option for hand sanitizer
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Soo'AE Sweet Pink Bubble Mask, Clarifying & Softening, 1 Count
Review Date: 2020/12/22
Store: SOOAE
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'SOOAE', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Softer', 'Scent': 'Peach', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Product Dimensions': '3.5 x 0.1 x 5.5 inches; 0.32 Ounces'}
Review Text: I’m pretty spoiled when it comes to facial products. I would say this is fine, not great, not terrible. It is a nicely packaged one time mask for a little at home spa day, but not something I’d go out and purchase over and over. It would make a really nice stocking stuffer or small gift for someone.
Review Title: It’s nice! But not incredible
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Rose Quartz Roller with Derma Roller 0.25mm, Facial Kit with Microneedle and Pink Jade Rollers
Review Date: 2020/12/22
Store: LOLYSENTA
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 5.1 x 1.6 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LS17', 'UPC': '850002524062', 'Manufacturer': 'LOLYSENTA, LLC'}
Review Text: What I liked? Really beautiful roller and I thought the derma roller was really cool...until I read the instructions. “Roll back and forth 4-5 times...only apply light pressure and do not PUNCTURE the skin....sterilize the roller before and after each use for 30 MINUTES in disinfecting alcohol”. Y’all, I’m a busy mom with a toddler, I do not have the time to disinfect something for almost an hour each time I use it, and by use it, I mean roll it 4-5 times total. So while the jade roller is really beautiful and easy to use in of itself, this derma roller kinda seems...extra. I personally would prefer this to just be the roller; I’m too worried about actually using the roller incorrectly and hurting my skin, so I’ll just leave that type of work to the professionals. If you are looking for a jade roller only, there are lots of other options. If you want the full derma experience, then this option would be great for you.
Review Title: Really nice combo, but with one caveat
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Kidskin- Foaming Body Wash with Tea Tree Oil- Helps Combat Body and Foot Odor and Stubborn Body Acne and Skin Issues - Cruelty Free, Gluten Free, Paraben Free, Sulfate Free, Unscented, and Vegan- Made in USA
Review Date: 2021/03/16
Store: Kidskin
Product Description: ['Kidskin Foaming Body Wash with Tea Tree Oil is designed exclusively for teens, tweens, pre teens, and boys and girls to work as an effective, yet gentle body wash. Natural ingredients like Allantoin and Bisabolol nourish beyond surface level, and penetrate into the lower levels of the skin for the deepest hydration possible, while active ingredient tea tree oil works to fight body acne and skin issues teens are commonly prone to. Unlike shower bars and other soaps, our products are designed to soothe problematic and compromised skin. With 100% Natural ingredients that are paraben, sulfate, fragrance, and gluten free, the Kidskin Foaming Body Wash with Tea Tree Oil is gentle enough for every day use. Our mission is to provide teens (like our own!) with a body wash that leaves them feeling fresh and confident so they can focus on what really matters- every day. Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Musa Sapientum (Banana) Extract, Polysorbate-20, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, ^ Glycerin, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Sea Salt (Sodium Chloride), Tetrasodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Allantoin, Bisabolol']
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar, Foam', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Kidskin', 'Scent': 'Tea Tree', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Package Dimensions': '7.83 x 2.83 x 2.24 inches; 8 Ounces', 'Item model number': '4012', 'UPC': '880628401263', 'Manufacturer': 'Kidskin'}
Review Text: Nice foamy consistency, does NOT irritate my daughter's sensitive skin. Has a nice, strong tea tree smell but it's not so overpowering that it's annoying. I can see how it would successfully cut through odor and the tea tree in it is great for skin.
Review Title: Strong tea tree smell but works!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Heyedrate Activated Charcoal Soap Bar and Face Wash | Organic, Vegan, Natural Soap made with Dead Sea Mud and Our Essential Oil Blend (1 Pack (5 Ounces))
Review Date: 2021/03/23
Store: Eye Love
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'Eye Love', 'Scent': 'Eucalyptus, Coconut, Grapefruit, Rosemary', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Natural, Vegan', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '4 x 1 x 1 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'UPC': '850436007827'}
Review Text: This looks like organic soap that I buy at farmer's market's and smells really fun! It has a hint of a lemon/lime smell to it. Just touching the bar of soap right out of the box, I knew it was a quality product. It is just a bit soft and silky-feeling, just like artisans soaps. It lathers up well and I love all of its ingredients. Highly recommend!!
Review Title: Quality charcoal soap!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 2 Pieces Shower Caps for Women Waterproof Reusable Shower Bowknot Bathing Hair Caps Long Short and Curly Hair for Girls (Leaves and Stripes)
Review Date: 2021/06/01
Store: Eralove
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Eralove', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '9.84 x 6.69 x 0.2 inches', 'Number of Pieces': '2', 'Product Dimensions': '9.84 x 6.69 x 0.2 inches; 3.39 Ounces'}
Review Text: Great shower cap. Perfect for long, thick hair, even with a clip in it. This was important to me, as I’ve had many shower caps not be large enough. It was comfortable and the elastic was not too tight. It has a cute bow in the front. If you have a small head, or short hair you might find it too large.
Review Title: Cute - kinda makes it fun to wear a shower cap again!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Baby Girl Bows Headbands Hair Accessories for Newborn Infant Toddler Girls' Shower (Boheme-7Pcs)
Review Date: 2021/06/30
Store: Toptim
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Age Range (Description)': 'Baby', 'Occasion': 'Baby Shower', 'Material': 'Nylon', 'Number of Items': '7', 'Brand': 'Toptim', 'Package Dimensions': '8.39 x 6.26 x 1.73 inches; 4.94 Ounces'}
Review Text: Great headband, my toddler still fits into it and actually wore it the entire day today. Great colors, patterns, texture, etc. Very happy. Buy them!
Review Title: Comfy, super cute and practical
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Vitamin C Cream - USDA Certified Organic Facial Cream - Advanced Formula - Potent Botanical Blend - Anti-Aging, Hydrate, Anti Wrinkle, Diminish Blemishes - 2oz
Review Date: 2021/08/29
Store: Everyday Beauty Helping You Feel Beautiful Inside And Out
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Everyday Beauty Helping You Feel Beautiful Inside And Out', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Whole Body', 'Package Dimensions': '2.17 x 2.13 x 1.93 inches; 2 Ounces'}
Review Text: This cream helped my husband clear up his fever blister scars within a few weeks. He loved the smell and consistency; I loved the USA organic label. He used it at night and was pleased - would purchase again.
Review Title: Helped heal fever blister scars
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Review Text: I’m pretty spoiled when it comes to facial products. I would say this is fine, not great, not terrible. It is a nicely packaged one time mask for a little at home spa day, but not something I’d go out and purchase over and over. It would make a really nice stocking stuffer or small gift for someone.

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Rose Quartz Roller with Derma Roller 0.25mm, Facial Kit with Microneedle and Pink Jade Rollers
Review Date: 2020/12/22
Store: LOLYSENTA
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 5.1 x 1.6 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LS17', 'UPC': '850002524062', 'Manufacturer': 'LOLYSENTA, LLC'}
Review Text: What I liked? Really beautiful roller and I thought the derma roller was really cool...until I read the instructions. “Roll back and forth 4-5 times...only apply light pressure and do not PUNCTURE the skin....sterilize the roller before and after each use for 30 MINUTES in disinfecting alcohol”. Y’all, I’m a busy mom with a toddler, I do not have the time to disinfect something for almost an hour each time I use it, and by use it, I mean roll it 4-5 times total. So while the jade roller is really beautiful and easy to use in of itself, this derma roller kinda seems...extra. I personally would prefer this to just be the roller; I’m too worried about actually using the roller incorrectly and hurting my skin, so I’ll just leave that type of work to the professionals. If you are looking for a jade roller only, there are lots of other options. If you want the full derma experience, then this option would be great for you.
Review Title: Really nice combo, but with one caveat
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

Unlike shower bars and other soaps, our products are designed to soothe problematic and compromised skin. With 100% Natural ingredients that are paraben, sulfate, fragrance, and gluten free, the Kidskin Foaming Body Wash with Tea Tree Oil is gentle enough for every day use. Our mission is to provide teens (like our own!) with a body wash that leaves them feeling fresh and confident so they can focus on what really matters- every day.     Structure your response as:
   
    SUMMARY:
    [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The analyzed purchase history indicates a preference for effective, quality skincare products, particularly those suited for sensitive skin. Consistently high ratings suggest a strong appreciation for products that are gentle and non-irritating, as highlighted by positive sentiments towards various cleansers and masks. The individual frequently opts for clean, natural formulations with appealing scents, though they exhibit sensitivity to unpleasant fragrances, as noted in the low rating for one lotion.

Themes around product use reveal a tendency towards comprehensive skincare routines, valuing products that enhance overall skin texture, hydration, and healing properties. There is also a likeliness to choose items that offer a spa-like experience, especially in masks.

Quality is a significant factor, with a clear inclination towards organic and value-driven brands. Price sensitivity appears moderate, as there are instances of purchasing both budget-friendly and higher-end items, prioritizing performance over price. Lastly, the desire for practicality is evident in choices like portable hand sanitizers and functional shower accessories, suggesting a busy lifestyle.

Overall, the core preferences underscore a commitment to gentle, effective skincare with natural ingredients, alongside a balance of quality and practicality in everyday purchases.

target_interaction.title: I bought this for me!
target_interaction.text: Great lotion, easy scent (I am pregnant and a lot of smells make me gag) and organic. I actually bought this on purpose for myself, because when I’m pregnant, I am very very careful what I put on my skin (our skin is our largest organ!). If I am going to be lathering something on my belly, I want to trust it. And I have found children’s lotions to be the best. Oh, and it’s USA made which is super important to me. My toddler loves the animals on this bottle and I love it’s ingredients - win, win.
target_interaction.title_meta: Gryph & IvyRose Coat of Arms Hydrating Lotion for Kids - Hydrating Moisturizer with Shea Butter & Coconut Oil - All Natural, Sustainable, Cruelty Free, No Parabens, No Sulfates, Vegan - USA Made - 8oz
features: DEEPLY HYDRATING: This gentle and soothing shea moisture for kids easily absorbs to add hydration and protect the skin's natural biome, leaving the skin silky smooth.
NO SYNTHETIC FRAGRANCE: Our kids body lotion contains no parabens, no sulfates, and no phthalates.
100% VEGAN & CRUELTY FREE: Made from all natural, kid safe ingredients, including shea butter, mango seed butter, and coconut oil.
HOW TO USE: Apply to damp skin after shower or bath. Suitable for the whole body. For best results, use after our Gryph & IvyRose kids body wash.
EARTH FRIENDLY: We make sure our products are good for you--and for the Earth! Our bottles are made from 100% recycled plastic and all our ingredients are sustainably sourced.
